ActCanada Wildlife Act
Environmental Violations Administrative Monetary Penalties Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Wildlife Area Regulations and the Environmental Violations Administrative Monetary Penalties Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the WILDLIFE AREA REGULATIONS and the ENVIRONMENTAL VIOLATONS ADMINISTRATIVE MONETARY PENALTIES REGULATIONS in order to establish the Edéhzhíe National Wildlife Area and prescribe its boundaries, which are the same as the Edéhzhíe Dehcho Protected Area.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0090 Publication Date: 2022-05-11

precis: Regulations Amending the WILDLIFE AREA REGULATIONS and the ENVIRONMENTAL VIOLATONS ADMINISTRATIVE MONETARY PENALTIES REGULATIONS in order to establish the Edéhzhíe National Wildlife Area and prescribe its boundaries, which are the same as the Edéhzhíe Dehcho Protected Area.
